name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-internship
title: Internship
shortDescription: This education sample shows how to build an ACE with a card view and quick view to display new and recent internships available to gain work experience.
longDescription: This education sample shows how to build an ACE with a card view and quick view to display new and recent internships available to gain work experience.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
